item.description: Start the evening in New Britain at 6 pm at Paradise Pizza - great food!  After dinner, we’ll go to the Hole in the Wall Theater and see “Jacques Lamarre Has Gone Too Far” 21st Century Laugh.  This is the debut of some hilarious irrepressible one-acts by local playwright Jacques Lamarre.  You buy your dinner and theater tickets are  $20.  Reserve by Nov. 25, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to Paradise, 10 East Street:  I-84 to 72E, take Exit 9 Main Street, at top of ramp turn right, at light turn left onto Chestnut Street, go to end, turn right onto East Street, go to end, facility on right corner.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Dinner and Theater
